snippet: Frank Schaefer, like other leaders of United Methodist congregations, had difficult choices to make when his son acknowledged that he is gay.
abstract: United Methodist Minister Rev Frank Schaefer endangered his own career after he decided to officiate at his son Tim's same-sex wedding; choice Schaefer made underscores conundrum between Christian doctrine on homosexuality and longings for spirituality and community from gay family members and congregants; Schaefer's congregation rebelled and he was defrocked, only to be reinstated later.
lead_paragraph: Frank Schaefer, like other leaders of United Methodist congregations, had difficult choices to make when his son acknowledged that he is gay.
